attributes.action: To boycott Donald Trump's products, services, businesses and brands
attributes.additional_details: Donald Trump is a businessman and the success of his businesses are important to him, to boycott his brands would be a reasonable response.
attributes.background: Donald Trump's miscalculated and incorrect policies hurt many people directly and indirectly worldwide, we can respond by boycotting his businesses and brands.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on members of the public to boycott products and services. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
